name: cmake-test-adapter
description: Run your CMake tests in the Sidebar of Visual Studio Code
author: Frédéric Bonnet <fredericbonnet@free.fr>

scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build

cmakeExplorer.suiteDelimiter.description: Delimiter used to split CMake test names into suite/test hierarchy

cmakeExplorer.buildDir.description: The CMake build directory (relative to the workspace folder)

cmakeExplorer.buildConfig.description: The CMake build configuration (empty for any)

cmakeExplorer.cmakeIntegration.description: Integrate with the CMake Tools extension for additional variables

cmakeExplorer.debugConfig.description: Custom debug configuration to use (empty for default)

cmakeExplorer.parallelJobs.description: The number of parallel test jobs (use zero to use the value of cmake.ctest.parallelJobs)

cmakeExplorer.extraCtestLoadArgs.description: Extra command-line arguments passed to CTest at load time

cmakeExplorer.extraCtestRunArgs.description: Extra command-line arguments passed to CTest at run time

cmakeExplorer.logpanel.description: Write diagnotic logs to an output panel

cmakeExplorer.logfile.description: Write diagnostic logs to the given file
